page.title: 19D-B Green:Boxer:Chatteris
page.content: Dave-Boy Green is the local boxing hero in Chatteris. He became interested in boxing when he was small, when a friend invited him to join the local amateur boxing club. His first manager gave him the most help in his career. He was about 19 when he first took boxing seriously, and in September 1974 he became professional. His family did not mind him boxing as they knew he was in good hands.In his amateur career he lost 31 and won 74 fights. In his professional career he lost 4 and won 37. When training he ran 5 miles per day. His best opponent was Sugar Ray Leonard.He was overwhelmed when he won the British title. He retired when he thought the sparkle had gone. He is married and has three children. He still lives in Chatteris.
